feed.title: La Vérendrye (Réserve faunique) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, La Vérendrye (Réserve faunique)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:20 a.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -4.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Val-d'Or Regional Airport 7:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: -4.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 24 km
Humidity: 42 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -15.2°C
Wind: NNE 17 km/h gust 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness this evening then snow beginning before morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Ice pellets or snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow changing to ice pellets in the morning then to freezing rain in the afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or rain. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain overnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 20 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
